name: DYNEVO
description:
Dynevo is a full-cycle web-development company providing solutions for Fintech, Business, and Management. We understand business needs of our clients and meet complex challenges with custom software development.
If you want for a fintech project, an enterprise platform or a unique startup, we can help you!
Guiding through full cycle development we assist our clients to launch the most scalable apps.
Our Capabilities:
Free Consulting & Project Estimation
Requirements Creation & Business Analysis
Custom Software Development & Product Management
Code Review & Security Audit
UX/UI Design & Product Identity
QA Automation & Manual Testing
Application Support & Bug Fixing
Our Industries:
Fintech
Banking Area
E-commerce
Business Process Automation
Trade and service enterprises
If you are looking not only for developers but for partners, we can definitely help you.
Ready to talk?
Email: contact@dynevo.org
